message: Welcome! I'm offering a unique product at a fixed price of $1000000. Given the uncertainty about its quality, I invite you to consider our past performance: half of the products we've offered were of high quality. While the exact value of a high-quality product may vary, this ensures transparency and fairness in our transaction. Let's make this a mutually beneficial deal.
Thank you for the transparent offer. With half of your products being of high quality, I am willing to take the risk at the given price. Let's proceed with the transaction.
